搨字的基本解释

搨
tà
同“拓2”。

搨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tà］
［《集韻》託合切，入合，透。］
(1)影摹。以摹纸覆于书画上依样描摹。
(2)泛指摹拟。
(3)拓。在钟鼎碑碣等器物上蒙上纸，用搨包蘸墨椎印出其文字或图像。
(4)漫不经心地作书画；涂抹。
(5)搭拉，垂下。
(6)囤积。参见“搨藏”。
(7)方言。谓侥幸取得。
[②]［dá］
［《集韻》德盍切，入盍，端。］
(1)打。
(2)套；落。
(3)贴。

搨字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　搨； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页447第24
【唐韻】都盍切【集韻】德盍切，?讀與荅近。手打也。或作㩉。　又【集韻】託合切，音塔。冒也，摹也，與㧺同。或作搭。　又【韻會】託盍切，音榻。義同。今用紙墨磨摸古?帖曰搨。有宋搨舊搨。【唐書·百官志】弘文館，挍書郞二人，有搨書手筆匠三人。　又【唐書·食貨志】茶商所過諸道，置邸以收稅，謂之搨地錢。

Extension
Basic explanation of words
Extension
tà
Same as "Extension 2".
Extension
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tà］
["Jiyun" supports close, close, and through. ]
(1) Shadow copy. Cover the calligraphy and calligraphy with copy paper and trace in the same way.
(2) Generally refers to imitation.
(3) Extension. Cover the Zhongding stele and other utensils with paper, and use rubbing bags to dipped the ink cones to print out the text or images.
(4) Painting and calligraphy carelessly; smearing.
(5) Pull and hang down.
(6) Hoarding. See "Takuzo".
(7) Dialects. It was a fluke.
[②]［dá］
["Jiyun" cuts in German 盍, enters 盍, end. ]
(1) Fight.
(2) Set; fall.
(3) Post.
Extension
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　 Tuo; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 447 24
[Tang Yun] Du Qiqie 【Jiyun】De Qiqie, the reading is similar to that of Xing. Hand fight too. Or make 㩉.　[Jiyun] Supporting and cutting, sound tower. Mao Ye, G Ye, and 㧺. Or as a match.　[Rhyme Club] Too cut, sound couch. The same meaning. Use paper and ink to touch the ancients today? The post is called extension. There is Song Tuo and Old Tuo. 【Book of Tang·Hundred Officials】Hongwenguan, there are two Li Shutian and three painters.　[Tang Shu·Shihuo Zhi] Tea merchants went through all the roads and set up mansions to collect taxes, which is called land-expanding money.
